sentences.en: Please shred these confidential documents before you leave the office.

sentences.pt: Ela se agarrou ao último resquício de esperança que lhe restava.

sentences.en: The snowboarder loves to shred down the mountain at high speed.

sentences.en: There is a small shred of hope that they might be found alive.
